Module swan.g09.cs230a2
Package swan.g09.cs230a2

Class GameTimer

java.lang.Object
java.util.TimerTask
swan.g09.cs230a2.GameTimer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class GameTimer extends TimerTask
A Timer that ticks every entity in the level on a variable interval.

    • endLevel

      public void endLevel() throws IllegalStateException
      Sets the tick for a level ending.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the timer has not been started yet or if level is not being timed

    • startLevel

      public void startLevel() throws IllegalStateException
      Sets the tick for a level starting.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the timer has not been started yet or level is already being timed

    • addTime

      public static int addTime(int seconds)
      Adds time to the level timer.
      Parameters:
      seconds - The number of seconds to add to the timer.
      Returns:
      the number of ticks now remaining

    • getTimeToComplete

      public double getTimeToComplete() throws IllegalStateException
      Gets the time to complete the previous level, in seconds.
      Returns:
      the time taken to complete the level, in seconds as a double
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the timer has not been started or the level has not finished being timed

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the timer.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if timer is already running

    • stop

      public void stop() throws IllegalStateException
      Stops the timer.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if timer is not running
